CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Earn a certificate stage positioned above or below the Register Courses stage?
SRP.A: The Earn a certificate stage is positioned {below} the Register Courses stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Complete the first lesson?
VE.A: The value of stage Complete the first lesson is {60%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Pass the final test?
VE.A: The value of stage Pass the final test is {32%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Earn a certificate?
VE.A: The value of stage Earn a certificate is {19%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Browse Course Page, with a value of {100%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Earn a certificate, with a value of {19%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Complete the assignment to stage Pass the final test?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Complete the assignment to stage Pass the final test is {14%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Browse Course Page to stage Register Learning Platform?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Browse Course Page to stage Register Learning Platform is {13%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 67%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Browse Course Page} stage has {100%}, the {Register Learning Platform} stage has {87%}, the {Register Courses} stage has {74%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 25%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 39% and 67%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Complete the first lesson} stage has {60%}, the {Complete the assignment} stage has {46%}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Register Courses to Complete the first lesson, or from stage Register Learning Platform to Register Courses?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Register Courses} to {Complete the first lesson} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Complete the first lesson to Complete the assignment, or from stage Register Courses to Complete the first lesson?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Complete the first lesson} to {Complete the assignment} is equal to the reduction from stage Register Courses to Complete the first lesson.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Browse Course Page to Register Learning Platform, from stage Register Learning Platform to Register Courses, or from stage Register Courses to Complete the first lesson?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Register Courses} to stage {Complete the first lesson} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Register Courses} and {Complete the first lesson} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Browse Course Page} and {Register Learning Platform} stages.
